name: Carrier Pigeon
description:
Developed for Global Game Jam 2018

GGJ Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/carrier-pigeon-0

You have just been hired by the most efficient mail service in history. Your job is to deliver mail as fast as possible. Jump, slide, and dive your way through a large and varied map to deliver your mail before time runs out. Be late three times and you're FIRED! 

By: Adam Eckert (https://funndev.itch.io/), Kyle Stevens (https://seltzy.itch.io/), Griffin Tull-Gauger
